# init(_:_:)

**Initializer**

Creates the invalidation type.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ invalidation1: Invalidation1, _ invalidation2: Invalidation2)
```

## Parameters

- **invalidation1**: The first item to invalidate.
- **invalidation2**: The second item to invalidate.
title: init(_:_:)
